subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/get_out_of_my_face-evp.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : This guy was not only heard on recording...I think he was effecting the device in a negative way also. Recording timer was sticking for up to 5 seconds, then continue without adding the seconds...very loud splatter (loud sounds) where heard while I played it back over speaker in the field. Also the REC led symbol was flashing on and off...it is supposed to stay on while recording. After replacing batteries with NO help, I told this "mischievious deity" to go AWAY. That worked. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/get_out_of_my_face-evp.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
